      • aroundThreadCurrentThread

        public Thread aroundThreadCurrentThread(org.aspectj.lang.ProceedingJoinPoint thisJoinPoint)
                                 throws Throwable
        Around advice executed in place of Thread.currentThread()}. The call does not define a yield point, but virtualized if executed by a cooperative thread.
        Parameters:
        thisJoinPoint - Join point.
        Returns:
        The current thread or what "appears" to be current thread.
        Throws:
        Throwable - In accordance to ProceedingJoinPoint.proceed().

      • around

        public void around(org.aspectj.lang.ProceedingJoinPoint thisJoinPoint,
                   Thread thread)
            throws Throwable
        Around advice executed in place of CSystem.sendSpuriousWakeup(Thread).
        Parameters:
        thisJoinPoint - Join point.
        thread - Target thread object.
        Throws:
        Throwable - In accordance to ProceedingJoinPoint.proceed().
        CInternalError - if current (calling) thread is not cooperative.
